content.query:
-- Basic medal table ordered by official Olympic ranking
SELECT
    Country,
    Rank,
    Gold,
    Silver,
    Bronze,
    Total,
    Rank_by_Total
FROM medals
ORDER BY Rank;

-- Rank countries by performance: total medals first, then gold & silver as tie breakers
SELECT
    Country,
    Gold,
    Silver,
    Bronze,
    Total
FROM medals
ORDER BY Total DESC, Gold DESC, Silver DESC;

-- Compute qualitative dominance: golds are worth more than bronzes.
-- This shows which nations TRULY dominated, beyond raw totals.
SELECT 
    Country,
    Gold,
    Silver,
    Bronze,
    Total,
    (Gold * 3 + Silver * 2 + Bronze * 1) AS DominanceScore
FROM medals
ORDER BY DominanceScore DESC;

-- Shows each nation's share of ALL medals and ALL gold medals.
-- Useful for gauging international competitive balance before 2026.
SELECT
    Country,
    Total,
    ROUND(Total * 100.0 / SUM(Total) OVER (), 2) AS PercentOfAllMedals,
    Gold,
    ROUND(Gold * 100.0 / SUM(Gold) OVER (), 2)     AS PercentOfAllGolds
FROM medals
ORDER BY PercentOfAllGolds DESC;
